description.english: Stole the audiograph from the gallery without disabling the safeguard floor
description.german: Die Audiographie aus der Galerie gestohlen, ohne den Sicherheitsboden zu deaktivieren

description.english: Used Semblance to mimic Shan Yun and sing into the microphone
description.german: Trugbild verwendet, um dich als Shan Yun auszugeben und ins Mikrofon zu singen

description.spanish: Has usado Semblanza para imitar a Shan Yun y cantar ante el micrófono
description.brazilian: Usou Semelhança para imitar Shan Yun e cantou no microfone
description.tchinese: 已用盜貌冒充單雲，對麥克風唱歌

description.polish: Użyto podobieństwa, by stać się Shan Yunem i zaśpiewać do mikrofonu

description.english: Dropped Ivan Jacobi through the trapdoor
description.german: Ivan Jacobi durch die Falltür stürzen gelassen

description.spanish: Has tirado a Ivan Jacobi por la trampilla

description.tchinese: 已讓依凡．賈柯比掉入暗門
description.russian: Вы сбросили Айвена Якоби в люк

description.english: Won the auction at Colibron Plaza

description.english: Opened every safe inside the main vault
description.german: Alle Tresore im Haupttresorraum geöffnet
description.french: Vous avez ouvert tous les coffres de la chambre forte principale
description.italian: Hai aperto tutte le casseforti nel caveau
description.spanish: Has abierto todas las cajas fuertes de la cámara principal

description.japanese: 大金庫室の中にある金庫を全て開けた
description.polish: Otworzono wszystkie sejfy w głównym skarbcu

description.english: Emptied the vault without tampering with any security systems, leaving everyone unharmed and asleep
description.german: Den Tresor ausgeraubt, ohne Schutzsysteme zu manipulieren, jemanden zu verletzen oder aufzuwecken
description.french: Vous avez vidé la chambre forte sans toucher au système de sécurité ni blesser le personnel endormi
description.italian: Hai ripulito il caveau senza manomettere i sistemi di sicurezza, addormentando tutti e non ferendoli
description.spanish: Has vaciado la cámara sin manipular los sistemas de seguridad y dejando a todos ilesos y dormidos
description.brazilian: Limpou o cofre sem alterar os sistemas de segurança, sem ferir ninguém e adormentando todo mundo
description.tchinese: 已在沒有操弄任何安全系統、所有人毫髮無傷並陷入昏睡的狀態下，將金庫洗劫一空
description.russian: Вы обчистили хранилище, не взламывая систему безопасности и не причиняя никому вреда
description.japanese: 敵に危害を加えずに眠らせて、保安装置に干渉することなく金庫室を空にした
description.polish: Opróżniono skarbiec bez majstrowania przy systemach ochrony, nie krzywdząc ani nie budząc nikogo

displayName.japanese: パーティークラッシャー

description.german: Den Haupttresor durch den Fußboden stürzen gelassen

description.brazilian: Fez o cofre desmoronar pelo chão

description.russian: Вы сделали так, чтобы хранилище провалилось под пол
description.japanese: 金庫室で床を突き破った
description.polish: Zrzucono skarbiec tak, że przebił się przez podłogę

description.english: Attended the meeting as Brother Cardoza

description.english: Pushed an enemy to his demise using Void Strike

description.polish: Zepchnięto przeciwnika w przepaść uderzeniem Pustki
